CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 31, 1946, pg. 17 reads: "...Take Time To Picnic - Participants in recent annual bridge tournament of the American Bridge Association, held here last week, along with friends and well-wishers, enjoyed themselves at a gala outing at South Park last week. The picnic was enjoyed by over... persons and their friends, as the bridge enthusiasts took time off from their steady playing to enjoy well-earned diversion. - Harris photo."
TitMainTitle: Full length group portrait of two women, one wearing striped dress, and man standing at bottom of curved, gated staircase, possibly water tower, at South Park during American Bridge Association picnic
CatSubject_tab: Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Group portraits--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Allegheny County (Pa.).Department of Parks, Recreation, and Conservation.South Park.
